data.database_description: The database is designed to manage and track various documents throughout their lifecycle within an organization. It captures detailed information about different types of documents, their statuses, associated shipping agents, and drafts. The system also maintains records of employee roles, addresses for mailing purposes, and the circulation history of document copies among employees. Additionally, it tracks when and where documents are mailed, ensuring comprehensive oversight over document handling processes from creation to delivery.

columns.columnDescription: Code that uniquely identifies each type of document.
Descriptive text explaining the nature or category of each document type.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Contains information about different types of documents and their descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique code for each role in the organization.
Detailed description of what the role entails.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Defines roles within the organization along with their descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each address.
Detailed information about the address, such as department or location code.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores mailing addresses used within the organization.

columns.columnDescription: Code that uniquely identifies each status of a document.
Descriptive text explaining the meaning of each document status code.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Provides a reference for different possible statuses a document can have along with descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Code that uniquely identifies each shipping agent.
Name of the shipping agent company or service.
Descriptive text providing more details about the shipping agent.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Lists shipping agents involved in document transportation with their names and descriptions.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each document.
Code representing the current status of the document.
Code indicating the type of the document.
Code identifying the shipping agent responsible for handling the document.
Date and time when the document was received.
Unique number associated with the receipt of the document.
Additional information related to the document.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Tracks detailed information about documents including their current status, type, shipping agent, and receipt details.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for each employee.
Code representing the role of the employee within the organization.
Full name of the employee.
Additional information about the employee.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Contains information about employees, including their roles and personal details.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document associated with this draft.
Identifier for a specific version or iteration of the document.
Textual information providing details about the draft, such as content summary or notes.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Stores information about different drafts of documents, including details for each draft.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document associated with this draft copy.
Identifier for the specific draft from which this copy was made.
Identifier for a unique instance or physical/print version of the draft.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Tracks individual copies made of specific drafts of documents.

columns.columnDescription: Identifier for the specific document being circulated.
Version number of the draft associated with the document.
Unique identifier for a particular copy of the document.
Identifier for the employee currently in possession of the document copy.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Tracks the distribution and handling of document copies among employees.

columns.columnDescription: Unique identifier for the document being tracked.
Identifier linking to the address where the document was mailed, referencing Addresses table.
Date and time when the document was mailed.

enriched_schema.tableDescription: Tracks documents that have been mailed, including destination and date of mailing.
